channel.title: Need help using rs2dv 2nd release and 317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5]
channel.description:
Well read the title, i need help with those two things.
I need help because im going to MAKE the best P Serve Ever, and hopefully with your help!!
These are the 'simple' tuts im looking for, then hopefully from there i will learn how to use ^^;
Adding Npc's Making Menu's Starting equipment Home Please Adding GLobal Objects.
You must remembe!! This is all different to the 317 severs like wL, there is no client.java
Best regards and hope you can help me Johno
And there will be a credits page on my server, will all your names who has helped me!
These are the three files i downloaded;
317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5] - has a project file and the source
rs2dv - rs2 base, what is it used for?

item.title: Need help using rs2dv 2nd release and 317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5]
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Guys, everyone starts off somewhere, i bet when you first ever got into ‘java’ you where like me, but give me a website to design and in 1 week i could get like WoW… Well obviously not AS good, but still good!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help using rs2dv 2nd release and 317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5]
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:3, topic:269452”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=355581.msg2721564#msg2721564 date=1238019504]
There are tutorials in the tutorials section.
[/quote]

Yes, but’s it not for this kind of stuff! Download it and have a look! There is no client.java, so WTF am i meant to do?![/quote]
That’s funny and you’re trying to create the best server ever? Give up.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help using rs2dv 2nd release and 317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:3, topic:269452”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=355581.msg2721564#msg2721564 date=1238019504]
There are tutorials in the tutorials section.
[/quote]

Yes, but’s it not for this kind of stuff! Download it and have a look! There is no client.java, so WTF am i meant to do?![/quote]
The client class does not exist because it has been split into various other classes.

Read full topic
